text: The Jakarta Post is a widely circulated English language daily newspaper in Indonesia. The publication is owned by PT Niskala Media Tenggara and is based in Jakarta. It started publishing since 25 April 1983. ==Other websites== *thejakartapost.com Category:1980s establishments in Indonesia Category:1983 establishments in Asia Category:English-language newspapers published in Asia Category:Indonesian culture Category:Jakarta
title: The Jakarta Post
